info.title: Honeywell Forge
info.description: Honeywell Forge is an Enterprise Performance Management Software-as-a-Service. It enables autonomous control of devices and codifies domain knowledge of assets in a contextual way. Use Honeywell Forge Connector to subscribe to Honeywell Forge to receive service cases and to close existing service cases.

post.summary: Register a webhook that allows you to receive open service cases
post.description: This operation registers a webhook that allows you to receive open service cases from Honeywell Forge.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Specify an ID for your project. The Project ID is a unique identifier that represents you as a customer in Honeywell Forge.

parameters.name: connectorId
parameters.description: Specify an ID for your connector. Connector ID is a unique identifier that represents your connector in Honeywell Forge.

url.description: Specify the URL where you want to receive service cases.
url.title: URL

200.description: The registration for the webhook has been cancelled.

delete.description: This operation cancels registration for a webhook.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the project for which you want to cancel connector registration.

parameters.name: connectorId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the connector for which you want to cancel registration.

200.description: The service case has been closed.

patch.description: This operation closes a service case.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Project for which you want to cancel a service case.

parameters.name: serviceCaseNumber
parameters.description: Specify the number of the service case which you want to close.

siteId.description: Specify the ID of the site where the equipment that caused the service case is located.
siteId.title: Site ID

status.description: Specify CLOSED to close the service case. This parameter updates the status of the service case.
status.title: Status

priority.description: Specify the priority of the service case.

rootCauseCode.title: Root Cause Code

serviceCaseClosedOn.description: Specify the date and time when the service has been closed in UNIX epoch format.
serviceCaseClosedOn.title: Service Case Closing Timestamp

200.description: The event has been sent to Honeywell Forge.

post.description: This operation sends success and failure events to Honeywell Forge.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the Project for which you want to send an event to Honeywell Forge.

parameters.description: The body of the event message that has been sent to Honeywell Forge.

corelationId.description: Specify Correlation ID of the transaction.
